ygData.subject: Testing loyalty
ygData.msgSnippet: Vulois looked at Windrazor, and than to Child. Windrazor, I guess you can here this, cause maybe I want an answer from you too. But first I ll ask Child.

Subject: Testing loyalty
Message-ID: <8oe4gl+esq5@...>

Content-Length: 985

Vulois looked at Windrazor, and than to Child.

"Windrazor, I guess you can here this, cause maybe I want an answer 
from you too. But first I'll ask Child. Child, I need to know 
everything about your father. I made an alliance with him just 
because he SAID he was for peace. I was rushing way into things. I 
don't know him, I don't know what he does, I don't know YOU. How do I 
know that you are only getting training from me so that you can use 
your powers for evil uses. Once you're done, kill me, destroy the 
embassy and than you and your father go on to rule the Universe. How 
do I know, Child?!? What proof can you give me that you are who you 
say you are. And you Windrazor, are you really Soundwave's friend? 
How do I know that you aren't just using the embassy as a base for 
some evil plans. Battera, Cybershark and Soundwave each showed me in 
some way that they trust me and believe in what I believe in. I need 
you two to do the same, or this training is over."
